alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys; Lower Yukon Valley; Upper Kuskokwim Valley; Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 15 at 1:11PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Two Rounds of Snow for the Yukon Delta, Yukon Valley, and Kuskokwim Valley through Friday... A two-pronged storm system will impact parts of the Yukon Delta, Yukon Valley, and Kuskokwim Valley, with the first coming late tonight through Wednesday. This will be a quick hitting front and will accumulate 2 to 5 inches of snowfall, with the heaviest accumulations from McGrath to the fringes of the Alaska Range. Another round of snowfall is expected as early as Wednesday night and will linger into Friday. This storm will bring higher accumulations ranging from 3 to 7 inches possible, with the heaviest accumulations once again from McGrath to the Alaska Range. Stay tuned for more on this system. For the latest forecast go to weather.gov/fairbanks.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys; Lower Yukon Valley; Upper Kuskokwim Valley; Yukon Delta
